forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind around 13 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 61. West southwest wind 12 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
The night in Downtown San Francisco unfolds under a tapestry of clouds, hinting at the cool embrace of the marine layer that often blankets the city. Temperatures linger near the mid-fifties, as a gentle, west-southwest wind whispers through the streets, creating an atmosphere imbued with the familiar chill of coastal air. As daybreak approaches, one can anticipate the clouds parting to reveal an evocative landscape; Sunday promises a mostly sunny disposition with temperatures rising close to the low sixties. 

The early hours may still present a lack of visibility, but by midday, the cityscape will unfurl itself in a brilliant display, warming to a vibrant skyline kissed by sunlight. With the breezy gusts aiming to lift spirits and invigorate the atmosphere, the day invites casual strolls along the waterfront or leisurely walks through nearby parks. It's wise to dress in layers, embracing a light sweater or jacket for the morning chill, but by midday, a more carefree garment will suffice as the sun begins to warm your back. The clear brilliance of the upcoming day provides an elegant backdrop for simple pleasures—perhaps a visit to a local café to savor a warm brew, or an afternoon of people-watching in one of the sun-dappled plazas. The beauty of a day like this lies in its quiet charm, encouraging moments of reflection and leisurely exploration.
